title: Netflix beats estimates as ad-supported memberships rise 34%
content: Advertising has become an increasingly important business model for media companies to boost — or in some cases, achieve — profitability for streaming.

title: Biden under intense pressure from Democrats to drop out of election against Trump
content: President Joe Biden to date has flatly rejected calls to exit the 2024 election contest against Donald Trump.

title: Ukraine's Zelenskyy gets personal with self-appointed 'peace' negotiator Orban

title: The West must be ready to face the 'deadly quartet' of global adversaries, analysts warn

title: Germany to slash military aid budget in blow to Ukraine
content: Germany is set to reduce funds dedicated to strengthening partner countries in the areas of security, defense and stabilization, its draft budget shows.

title: This 28-year-old raised $20 million for his mental health startup. His No. 1 advice? 'Be a bit delusional'

title: UK wants to prevent a repeat of the Liz Truss 'mini-budget' crisis — which triggered huge bond sell-off
content: A new bill would prevent "significant uncosted measures" from being announced without an analysis of their impact on public finances.

title: Citadel's Ken Griffin buys a stegosaurus for $45 million in a record auction sale
content: Ken Griffin purchased a late Jurassic stegosaurus skeleton for $44.6 million at Sotheby's on Wednesday, marking the most valuable fossil ever sold at auction.

title: U.S.-China tensions are not a 'new Cold War,' veteran Singapore diplomat Bilahari Kausikan says

title: What would a second Trump presidency mean for China? Goldman Sachs weighs in
